projects.name: AgileCharge.io
projects.description: Smart Battery Energy Trading SAAS project focused on renewable battery charging and optimizing energy trading windows. Involves multiple API integrations with inverter manufacturers, Octopus Energy, and users' smart meters.
projects.outcome: Successfully deployed platform allowing users to optimize their energy usage and trading, resulting in cost savings and more efficient use of renewable energy.

projects.name: Memir.ai
projects.description: AI SAAS project focused on curating AI Agents for personal coaching utilizing different LLM platforms. Provides personalized AI coaching experiences tailored to individual needs.
projects.outcome: Created an innovative platform that leverages AI for personalized coaching, improving accessibility to coaching resources.

projects.name: Embedded Systems Simulation Framework
projects.description: A comprehensive testing framework for embedded systems using emulation and simulation techniques for thorough unit testing and validation.
projects.outcome: Significantly improved quality assurance processes for embedded systems by enabling thorough testing before hardware deployment.

projects.name: Cloud-Native Deployment Platform
projects.description: Self-hosted deployment infrastructure using Coolify and Docker for scalable application hosting with integrated CI/CD pipelines.
projects.outcome: Created a robust and scalable deployment infrastructure that improved deployment efficiency and reliability.
